description:
Nice to meet you udemy users! You are very fortunate to have clicked this video. It will teach you very special skills. Forget about all the low level magics you've seen before! You can do this magic trick anywhere at anytime to anyone with no gimmick. It will make you stand out anywhere you go, especially at bars, restaurants, and parties. By using bottles, cigarettes, coins, etc, learn 10 different magic tricks now!

title: Bar magic
